Title: LAPO MfB appoints Aghimien as non-executive director
Summary: LAPO Microfinance Bank appoints Edward Osayomwanbor Aghimien as non-executive director . The economist and marketing professional has over four decades of experience . His career spans fast-moving consumer goods sector, retail operations, and business development .

Title: Wizkid, Asake release ‘Jogodo’ ahead of joint EP
Summary: Afrobeats stars Ayodeji “Wizkid” Balogun and Ahmed “Asake” Ololade have released a new song titled Jogodo . The track arrived on streaming platforms in the early hours of Friday and serves as the lead single .

Title: Farmers beg FG to subsidise solar-powered irrigation facilities
Summary: Farmers beg FG to subsidise solar-powered irrigation facilities . Appeal followed a research study conducted by a climate-change expert . The appeal follows the growing impact of climate change on food security .

Title: Agric firm denies fraud allegations over sharing of N1b profits to Ekiti youths
Summary: Management of an Ekiti agric firm denies fraud allegations over sharing of N1b profits to Ekiti youths . Management of YSJ Farms Limited denies allegations that it defrauded some youths in Ekiti State .

Title: NEC targets non-oil revenue expansion, sets up panel on Tinubu’s legacy projects
Summary: The National Economic Council (NEC) resolved to deepen engagement with critical stakeholders . The Council, chaired by Vice President Kashim Shettima, stressed the importance of non-oil revenue mobilisation .

Title: Tinubu salutes Bisi Akande’s national legacy at 87
Summary: Tinubu said this in a special tribute on Thursday to celebrate Akande’s life of service and democratic commitment . He paid tribute to Bisi Akande, who died at the age of 87 .

Title: Police insist bail is free, urge public to report erring officers
Summary: Police insist bail is free, urge public to report erring officers . Adeh spoke in reaction to public outcry that some police officers were demanding money to release suspects on bail in the territory .

Title: Slot ‘happy’ to welcome Salah back at Liverpool after AFCON
Summary: Salah set to play in Egypt's third-place play-off match against Nigeria in Morocco on Saturday . Salah is set to return to Liverpool after AFCON .

Title: Just in: Panic as Lagos public school building collapses in Ikorodu
Summary: As of press time, the remote cause of incident and extent of damage were being investigated . Preliminary reports confirmed that students were not in the classrooms at the time of the collapse .

Title: Alleged N1.35bn fraud: Supreme Court orders trial of ex-Gov Lamido, sons
Summary: Supreme Court orders trial of Sule Lamido and two of his sons Mustapha and Aminu . They are accused of complicity in money laundering totalling about N1.35 billion . The former Governor of Jigawa State is accused of money laundering .
